title: Looking for a PSA or SGC Cobb red background! Help a brotha' out! :)
author: luciobar1980

posts.post_title: Looking for a PSA or SGC Cobb red background! Help a brotha' out! :)
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, I used to collect as a kid and have always loved baseball. I have been a comic collector for years and am recently getting back into cards. For my first purchase I've been scouring the internet for a nicely-presenting PSA or SGC graded 1-3 (?) for somewhere in the $700 - $1200 range. Have a double? I'd love to take it off your hands. Help a guy getting back into the hobby!  

Thanks!

Lucio
